general: You are enough, exactly as you are.
Your feelings deserve to be heard and honored.
You bring good into the world simply by being in it.
Your movement tells a story only you can tell.
Progress in dance is not about perfection, it's about expression.
Your body is strong, capable, and uniquely yours.
You are allowed to slow down when things feel heavy.
You don’t have to figure everything out today.
One small step is still progress.
You matter more than you know.
You deserve kindness... including from yourself.
You are worthy of love, rest, and joy.
